scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-contacts/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-contacts/cli run build && pnpm --filter minions-contacts-docs run build && pnpm --filter minions-contacts-blog run build && pnpm --filter minions-contacts-web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter minions-contacts-blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter minions-contacts-docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter minions-contacts-web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-contacts/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-contacts/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-contacts/cli run lint
